席.definition: woven mat; seat; banquet; place in a democratic assembly; classifier for banquets, conversations etc

席位.definition: a seat (in a theater, stadium etc); parliamentary or congressional seat

席凡寧根.definition: Scheveningen, resort in Den Haag (The Hague), Netherlands

席勒.definition: Schiller (name); Johann Christoph Friedrich von Schiller or Friedrich Schiller (1759-1805), German poet and dramatist

席地而坐.definition: to sit on the ground or the floor (idiom)

席夢思.definition: spring mattress (loanword from "Simmons" bedding company name)

席捲.definition: to engulf; to sweep; to carry away everything
